sourcesContent:
import {Box, Flex} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import React from "react";
import {Trans, useTranslation} from "react-i18next";

export function Information() {
    const elementRef = React.useRef(null);
    const { t } = useTranslation();

  return (
    <Box w={{ base: "auto", lg: "1200px" }} m="0 auto">
        <>
            <Flex
                id=""
                mt={{ base: "0", lg: "4em" }}
                justifyContent="space-between"
                flexDirection={{ base: "column", lg: "unset" }}
                alignItems={{ base: "center", lg: "unset" }}
                px={{ base: 5, lg: 0 }}
            >
                <Animate margin="200px">
                    <Flex
                        flexDirection="column"
                        alignItems="baseline"
                        justifyContent="space-evenly"
                    >
                        <Text as="h1" fontSize="4xl" fontWeight="600" mt="5">
                            <Trans i18nKey="HomaPage.Information" />
                        </Text>
                        <Text as="p" lineHeight="2" mt="5">
                            1243445465
                        </Text>
                    </Flex>
                </Animate>
                <Desktop>
                    <Animate fade>
                        <Flex>
                            <Box
                                backgroundImage="url('/assets/images/parsiyel.jpg')"
                                w={{ base: "337px", lg: "545px" }}
                                h={{ base: "224px", lg: "360px" }}
                                backgroundSize="cover"
                                borderRadius="8px"
                                mt={{ base: "10", lg: "0" }}
                            />
                        </Flex>
                    </Animate>
                </Desktop>
            </Flex>

            <Animate>
                <Flex
                    id="feature"
                    mt="100px"
                    mb="74px"
                    display="grid"
                    gridTemplateColumns={{ base: "1fr", lg: "1fr 1fr 1fr" }}
                    gridGap="20px"
                    px={{ base: 5, lg: 0 }}
                >
                    <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="baseline">
                        <Image src="/assets/icons/calculator.svg" mb="5" alt="" />
                        <Text as="p" lineHeight="2">
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box1.Title")}
                        </Text>
                        <Link
                            href={routeWithParameters(urls.LTLTransport)}
                            mt="5"
                            _hover={{ textDecoration: "none" }}
                            fontWeight="500"
                            borderBottom="1px solid black"
                        >
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box1.Button")}
                        </Link>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="baseline">
                        <Image src="/assets/icons/pie-chart.svg" mb="5" alt="" />
                        <Text as="p" lineHeight="2">
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box2.Title")}
                        </Text>
                        <Link
                            href={routeWithParameters(urls.LTLTransport)}
                            mt="5"
                            _hover={{ textDecoration: "none" }}
                            fontWeight="500"
                            borderBottom="1px solid black"
                        >
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box2.Button")}
                        </Link>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="baseline">
                        <Image src="/assets/icons/shield.svg" mb="5" alt="" />
                        <Text as="p" lineHeight="2">
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box3.Title")}
                        </Text>
                        <Link
                            href={routeWithParameters(urls.LTLTransport)}
                            mt="5"
                            _hover={{ textDecoration: "none" }}
                            fontWeight="500"
                            borderBottom="1px solid black"
                        >
                            {t("LTLInformation.Box3.Button")}
                        </Link>
                    </Flex>
                </Flex>
            </Animate>

            <Icon
                ref={elementRef}
                display="flex"
                name="scroll"
                cursor="pointer"
                color="black"
                w="25px"
                ml="50%"
                onClick={() => toElement(elementRef)}
            />
        </>
    </Box>
  );
}
